meanings.definition: A large, influential church with a large congregation and extensive resources.
meanings.sent1: The superchurches in our city have thousands of members.
meanings.sent2: People love attending superchurches because of the sense of community.
meanings.sent3: When the tiny chapel tried to imitate the superchurches, it looked comical.
meanings.sent4: In the world of churches, they were the superchurches, towering over the rest.
meanings.sent5: The superchurches stood like giants in the religious landscape.

meanings.definition: The act of attending or belonging to a superchurch.
meanings.sent1: Her dedication to the superchurches was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: Membership at superchurches comes with many benefits.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his hobby was collecting superchurches.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, she carried the spirit of the superchurches.
meanings.sent5: Every Sunday, the faithful flocked to the superchurches.

meanings.definition: To grow or expand into a superchurch.
meanings.sent1: The small congregation hoped to one day superchurches.
meanings.sent2: Their goal was to superchurches and reach more people.
meanings.sent3: The idea of their little church superchurches seemed impossible.
meanings.sent4: Like a seed turning into a tree, they aimed to superchurches.
meanings.sent5: Their vision was to superchurches and make a difference in the community.
